posts.post_content:
1st-pick material. [Enslave](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name= Enslave) is still amazing.
  
I love how the blood-cost that [Geth's Verdict](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Geth's Verdict), [Vapor Snare](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Vapor Snare), and [Glissa's Scorn](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Glissa's Scorn ) had, the overall theme of Phyrexia getting off-color effects, and the violating tone of Phyrexian cards matched so well on a *reprint*. Good job WotC.
posts.html:
1st-pick material. Enslave is still amazing.
I love how the blood-cost that Geth's Verdict, Vapor Snare, and Glissa's Scorn had, the overall theme of Phyrexia getting off-color effects, and the violating tone of Phyrexian cards matched so well on a reprint. Good job WotC.

Posted By: infernox10 (5/24/2011 2:25:04 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
I'm pretty sure it's actually sunblast angel without her helmet, judging from the armor she's wearing. With this I can run 8 copies of "mind control" in a blue black deck, awesome. Only problem is that with domestication, and volition reigns, this card is kind of obsolete. I can run it in mono black, but a mind control for 6 mana that hurts them.. while still good.. isn't the same as a 5 mana mind control in blue that is all upside, or a more color intensive volition reigns that lets me take anything.
  
   
Still, I probably will make a creature steal deck with it that has 4 of these.. 4 mind controls.. and then just go crazy on anyone playing titans. Will be terrible against pyromancer ascension and proliferate decks, but still be fun anyways.
  
   
On a side note, notice how numerous black cards are always depicting some angel getting killed? For example... doom blade, induce despair, slave of bolas, grasp of darkness, etc.
posts.html:
I'm pretty sure it's actually sunblast angel without her helmet, judging from the armor she's wearing. With this I can run 8 copies of "mind control" in a blue black deck, awesome. Only problem is that with domestication, and volition reigns, this card is kind of obsolete. I can run it in mono black, but a mind control for 6 mana that hurts them.. while still good.. isn't the same as a 5 mana mind control in blue that is all upside, or a more color intensive volition reigns that lets me take anything.

Still, I probably will make a creature steal deck with it that has 4 of these.. 4 mind controls.. and then just go crazy on anyone playing titans. Will be terrible against pyromancer ascension and proliferate decks, but still be fun anyways.

On a side note, notice how numerous black cards are always depicting some angel getting killed? For example... doom blade, induce despair, slave of bolas, grasp of darkness, etc.
